mysteryDungeon:ExplorersDeck.NAME: Explorer's deck
mysteryDungeon:ExplorersDeck.DESCRIPTION: Will become a deck of 5 cards once you choose your explorer.

mysteryDungeon:PartnersDeck.NAME: Partner's Deck
mysteryDungeon:PartnersDeck.DESCRIPTION: Will become a deck of 5 cards once you choose your partner.

mysteryDungeon:ColorlessAgility.NAME: Agility
mysteryDungeon:ColorlessAgility.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:ChooseAttack.NAME: Attack
mysteryDungeon:ChooseAttack.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Attack to your hand.

mysteryDungeon:ChooseSkill.NAME: Skill
mysteryDungeon:ChooseSkill.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Skill to your hand.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurBulletSeed.NAME: Bullet Seed
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurBulletSeed.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Can be upgraded multiple times.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurChlorophyll.NAME: Chlorophyll
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurChlorophyll.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! card. NL If you drew an Attack, gain 1 Strength.
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurChlorophyll.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL For each Attack drawn this way, gain 1 Strength.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurDoubleEdge.NAME: Double Edge
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurDoubleEdge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain Strength equal to the unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurDoubleEdge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Gain Strength equal to the unblocked damage dealt. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurExplorerForm.NAME: Explorer Form
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurExplorerForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Regen. NL At the start of your turn lose 1 Dexterity.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurFrenzyPlant.NAME: Frenzy Plant
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurFrenzyPlant.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Apply 2 Poison !M! times. NL You cannot heal during this turn and the next.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurGigaDrain.NAME: Giga Drain
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurGigaDrain.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Heal HP equal to unblocked damage.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurIngrain.NAME: Ingrain
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurIngrain.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 mysterydungeon:Leech_Seed to a random enemy !M! times. NL Lose 2 Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurMegaDrain.NAME: Mega Drain
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurMegaDrain.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP per different *debuff on the enemy.
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurMegaDrain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP per different *debuff on the enemy. NL draw 1 card.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurPetalDance.NAME: Petal Dance
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurPetalDance.DESCRIPTION: Deal 7 damage to ALL enemies at the end of your turn for the next !M! turns. NL (This counts as an *Attack and so scales with *Strength, etc.)

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurPoisonJab.NAME: Poison Jab
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurPoisonJab.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Poison 2 times.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurProtect.NAME: Protect
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurProtect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You cannot gain Block from cards during the next !M! turns.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSecretPower.NAME: Secret Power
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSecretPower.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Add random Power in your hand. NL Exhaust
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSecretPower.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Add random upgraded Power in your hand. NL Exhaust

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSeedBomb.NAME: Seed Bomb
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSeedBomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSleepPowder.NAME: Sleep Powder
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSleepPowder.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! mysterydungeon:Asleep to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSolarBeam.NAME: Solar Beam
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSolarBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! less cards during your next turn.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurStrengthSap.NAME: Strength Sap
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurStrengthSap.DESCRIPTION: Ennemy loses !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Strength if ennemy lost Strength that way. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSunnyDay.NAME: Sunny Day
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSunnyDay.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of each turn, NL draw one more card and reduce by 1 the cost of the card with the highest cost in your hand.
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSunnyDay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, NL draw one more card and reduce by 1 the cost of the card with the highest cost in your hand.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSynthesis.NAME: Synthesis
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurSynthesis.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL At the start of your next turn, NL draw 2 more cards and gain [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurToxic.NAME: Toxic
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurToxic.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! mysterydungeon:Toxic to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurToxic.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! mysterydungeon:Toxic to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurVenoshock.NAME: Venoshock
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurVenoshock.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each stack of Poison of the ennemy.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurWorrySeed.NAME: Worry Seed
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurWorrySeed.DESCRIPTION: Your *card *rewards will contain 1 more card choice.

mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurYawn.NAME: Yawn
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurYawn.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Apply !M! mysterydungeon:Asleep right before they act (after Poison, etc.). NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:BulbasaurYawn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! mysterydungeon:Asleep right before they act (after Poison, etc.). NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderBellyDrum.NAME: Belly Drum
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderBellyDrum.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! more card. NL The first card you play each turn costs 0 and exhausts.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderBlastBurn.NAME: Blast Burn
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderBlastBurn.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust your hand.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderBlaze.NAME: Blaze
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderBlaze.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Vulnerable. NL The first time you spend all energy each turn, gain [E].
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderBlaze.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Vulnerable. NL The first 2 times you spend all energy each turn, gain [E].

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderCounter.NAME: Counter
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderCounter.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you lose all Block and take damage from an attack, deal !M! damage to the attacker.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderCrunch.NAME: Crunch
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderCrunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonBreath.NAME: Dragon Breath
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonBreath.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of exhausted cards this combat.
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonBreath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to 5 + the number of exhausted cards this combat.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonClaw.NAME: Dragon Claw
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL (Scales when using *Metal *Claw.)

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonDance.NAME: Dragon Dance
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonDance.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust !M! cards. NL Draw !mysteryDungeon:M2! cards. NL (You cannot play this card if you cannot exhaust !M! cards.)

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonPulse.NAME: Dragon Pulse
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonPulse.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn: NL Add a random card from your exhaust pile on the top of draw pile.
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonPulse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn: NL Draw !M! card. NL Add a random card from your exhaust pile on the top of draw pile.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonRage.NAME: Dragon Rage
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonRage.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Enemy loses !M! HP. Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonRush.NAME: Dragon Rush
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonRush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Choose a card from your exhaust pile and add it to your discard pile. Exhaust a random card from your draw pile. Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonTail.NAME: Dragon Tail
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonTail.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When exhausted: NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a copy of this card on top of your draw pile.
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDragonTail.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When exhausted: NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Add a copy of this card on top of your draw pile. NL Next Turn, draw 1 more card.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDrought.NAME: Drought
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderDrought.DESCRIPTION: When you apply mysterydungeon:Burn, apply !M! more.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderEmber.NAME: Ember
mysteryDungeon:CharmanderEmber.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply mysterydungeon:Burn equal to the unblocked damage.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderExplorerForm.NAME: Explorer Form

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderFireBlast.NAME: Fire Blast

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderHeatCrash.NAME: Heat Crash

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderSleepTalk.NAME: Sleep Talk

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderSmokescreen.NAME: Smokescreen

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleHaze.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Add !M! *Freeze to your discard pile.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleHydroCannon.NAME: Hydro Cannon
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleHydroCannon.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle 2 *Freeze into your draw pile.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleIceBeam.NAME: Ice Beam
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleIceBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add 1 *Freeze to your hand.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleMist.NAME: Mist
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleMist.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is not attacking, gain !M! Artifact. NL Gain !B! Block.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleProtect.NAME: Protect
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleProtect.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL You cannot gain Block during the next !M! turns.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleRainDance.NAME: Rain Dance
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleRainDance.DESCRIPTION: When a card is created this combat, gain !M! Temporary Strength.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleRainDance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL When a card is created this combat, gain !M! Temporary Strength.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleRainDish.NAME: Rain Dish
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleRainDish.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is scried or discarded, gain !M! Block.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleRainDish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever a card is scried or discarded, gain !M! Block.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleRapidSpin.NAME: Rapid Spin
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleRapidSpin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain !M! artifact.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleScald.NAME: Scald
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleScald.DESCRIPTION: Discard up to !mysteryDungeon:M2! cards. Deal !D! damage and apply !M! mysterydungeon:Burn per card discarded that way.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleShellSmash.NAME: Shell Smash
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleShellSmash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Shuffle !mysteryDungeon:M2! *Freeze into your draw pile.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashGo.NAME: Skull Bash Go!
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashGo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If this is the last card in hand play it twice. Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashGo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL If this is the last card in hand play it twice. Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashReady.NAME: Skull Bash: Ready!
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashReady.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Skull *Bash: *Set in your draw pile.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashReady.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Shuffle a *Skull *Bash: *Set in your draw pile.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashSet.NAME: Skull Bash: Set!
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashSet.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add a *Skull *Bash: *Go! into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSkullBashSet.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Skull *Bash: *Go! into your draw pile. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSubstitute.NAME: Substitute
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSubstitute.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your draw pile. NL Add it to your hand and put a *Wound where the card was. NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleSubstitute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from your draw pile. NL Add a copy of that card to your hand and put a *Wound at the card's location. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleTorrent.NAME: Torrent
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleTorrent.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, gain !M! Temporary Strength.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWaterSpout.NAME: Water Spout
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWaterSpout.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M! card. NL Apply !mysteryDungeon:M2! Weak. NL Deal !D! damage.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWaterSpout.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Scry !M! cards. NL Apply !mysteryDungeon:M2! Weak. NL Deal !D! damage.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWhirlpool.NAME: Whirlpool
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWhirlpool.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your X next turns, draw 2 more cards and discard 2 cards. NL Exhaust.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWhirlpool.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your X+1 next turns, draw 2 more cards and discard 2 cards. NL Exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWithdraw.NAME: Withdraw
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleWithdraw.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle your discard pile into your deck. NL Gain !M! Block per card in hand.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleZenHeadbutt.NAME: Zen Headbutt
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleZenHeadbutt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Create a *Flinch and add it to your hand.
mysteryDungeon:SquirtleZenHeadbutt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Create an upgraded *Flinch and add it to your hand.
